body_text: Why is Sailor Moon (2014) not airing on TV? The new Sailor Moon seems to be showing on Niconico exclusively. Why would it not air on TV, or both?

Is intentionally producing a lower quality TV release unique to anime? A lot of shows nowadays are significantly censored or badly drawn for TV release. When the home media versions come out, they are uncensored and in some cases redrawn in certain areas.


Kagerou Project TV - BluRay Comparison
Part of this is of course the rush to release, but when the BluRays / DVDs come out, these are some of the main selling points of the shows in order to engage previous viewers.

Tokyo Ghoul TV - BluRay Comparison
Is this something unique to anime and its market? I haven't seen anything like it in Western media
